text: Yadi uniharu vimukha hunchan bhane hamile tapa'ila'i uniharuko nimti kunai sanraksaka bana'era patha'eka chainaum. Tapa'imathi ta matra (sandesa)purya'idine jim'mevari cha. Ra jaba hamile manisala'i aphno dayalutako rasasvadana gara'umchau ta tyasabata u magna bha'ihaldacha, ra yadi uniharula'i uniharukai karmaharuko karanale kunai kasta pugdacha ta niscaya nai tyahi manisa bado krtaghna banihalchan
